text.text: The property totals 26,373 hectares or 260 square kilometres adjacent and contiguous to Power Metal's Case Lake Lithium property.

Geological data points to a common environment for the occurence of Lithium-Cesium-Tantalum pegmatites. Published results from Power Metals have substantiated these claims, with lithium intercepts such as 1.58% Li<sub>2<sub /> over 15.00m in drill hole PWM-22-134 and cesium intercepts such as 6.74% Cs<sub>2</sub>O over 5.00m and 11.00 to 16.00m in drill hole PWM-18-126
